mapper.select: select rownum guide_no, guide_subject,user_nick,text_tour_date,reservation_person from guide, users,text,reservation where reservation.user_id=users.user_id and reservation.guide_no=guide.guide_no and text.text_no=guide.guide_no

select rownum tour_no, tour_theme,user_nick,text_tour_date,reservation_person from tour, users,text,reservation where reservation.user_id=users.user_id and reservation.tour_no=tour.tour_no and text.text_no=tour.tour_no
